title: Tribunal Cases
body: do we have this in oce?

replies.body:
Hi,

You can read all about the player behaviour features that we have in OCE in on our [Player Behaviour FAQ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/L65wrRYe-player-behaviour-faq-updated-for-instant-feedback) boards post.  This should hopefully address any questions you have about the Tribunal and how it works.

Cheers
Mindstar
